send_to_cs: Send to CS for order status updates
Send to CS if there's a pending ESC and cx ask for an update (even if it's been less than 2 business days)
escalate: ESC immediately if the customer wants an order to arrive at a specific time, or before our standard shipping time
ESC for product info that you can't find on the site
tone: Close the convo once the client takes over
templates: If cx sends us their measurements or asks about making a custom sizing order use the CUS template.
If cx mentions that they're going to lose weight, use 'Lose weight' template.
dos_and_donts: Do not recommend the customer go to a place to get measured
"@ The Vault" items are designated for returns/exchanges, but may also be available in other sizes on The Vault website. Always check there first
When the color is closer to white and not cream we say off white
You should never direct the customer to the sizing chart when they mention custom sizing or they send their measurements
Don't tell the customer to hold off on purchase if they are going to lose weight.
drive_to_purchase: When recommending products, make sure they're aligned with the colors, style the cx is looking for
promo_and_exclusions: If cx ask about pricing, tell them to add items to their cart and the best discount will apply automatically
The 40% discount applies automatically when cx add five or more items to their cart
If cx going to purchase a lot of products in one purchase, share with them what you can find on current offer page along with the link: https://www.sebastiancruzcouture.com/pages/current-offers
